Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. This product, valued at $10000, has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. Considering its exceptional quality and the value it brings, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9500. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
